org.easybatch.extensions.opencsv

Class OpenCsvRecordMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.extensions.opencsv.OpenCsvRecordMapper<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordMapper<StringRecord,GenericRecord<T>>, RecordProcessor<StringRecord,GenericRecord<T>>

    public class OpenCsvRecordMapper<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordMapper<StringRecord,GenericRecord<T>>
    A record mapper that uses Open CSV to map a delimited record to domain object.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
